content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: BulkDeleteZoneRecords path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/zones/{zone_id}/bulk/records/delete content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path

schema
type str
name zoneid
desc a dns zone id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum delete multiple records
reqbody
zonebulkdeletezonerecordsmessage
type obj
zonerecordids
type str
desc the ids of the resource records to delete
desc the fields needed to delete multiple dns zone resource records
required true
responses
title: 21_Resource Records_BulkDeleteZoneRecords_112.json
